translations: 缠绕者；[法]歪曲事实的人（twister 的复数）

sentences.sentence: They even took the Apricot Twisters!
sentences.translation: 他们甚至还拿走了杏味胶皮糖！

sentences.sentence: Do tongue twisters twist your tongue?
sentences.translation: 绕口令有没有让你的舌头打结呀？

sentences.sentence: You guys don't like Apricot Twisters?
sentences.translation: 你们不喜欢杏味胶皮糖吗？
